src:
Persipura Bungkam Madura United 1-0 di Babak Pertama
03 Nov 2019, 19:43 by Miftahol Umar


Persipura Bungkam Madura United 1-0 di Babak Pertama

KBRN, Bangkalan: Madura United kembali melakoni laga kandang melawan Persipura Jayapura dalam laga lanjutan liga 1 2019 di Stadion Gelora Bangkalan. Minggu (3/11/2019).
Tim Madura United, menggunakan costum, Merah, Hitam, Merah, sementara Tim Tamu Persipura Jayapura menggunakan costum Hitam, Putih Putih. Tim tuan rumah di menit ke-3 langasung ke bobolan gawangnya lewat tendangan tim tamu Persipura Jawa Pura M. Tahir.
Kebangkitan tim tamu yang sudah diwaspadai oleh tim Laskar Sapeh Kerrap sebelumnya ternyata belum mampu dibendungnya, terbukti pertindingan di babak pertama sampai selesai scor bertahan 0-1. Tim tamu Persipura Jayapura memberikan permainan yang tidak terduga meskipun bermain di kandang Madura, Persipura memiliki kekuatan yang solid setelah kembali di latih oleh pelatih lamanya Jacksen F Tiago.
Perjalanan pertandingan di babak pertama berlangsung cukup seru, tekanan demi tekanan dari kedua tim saling di lancarkan, namun tim tuan ruah meski mempunyai sejumlah kesempatan emas belum mampu membobol gawang tim tamu. Sekedar diketahui, Persipura Jayapura saat ini menduduki di urutan empat klasemen liga 1 2019 dengan raihan 40 angka, sementara Madura United berada di posisi kedua dengan mengantongi 44 Poin.
text:
Persipura Mute Madura United 1-0 in the First Round
03 Nov 2019, 19:43 by Miftahol Umar


Persipura Mute Madura United 1-0 in the First Round

KBRN, Bangkalan: Madura United is back in the home match against Persipura Jayapura in the continued league match 1 in 2019 at the Bangkalan Stadium. Sunday (3/11/2019).
The Madura United Team uses the Red, Black, and Red Costum, while the Jayapura Persipura Guest Team uses the Black, White and White Costum. The home team in the 3rd minute langasung to bobolan gawangnya through the kick of the visitors of the Persipura Jawa Pura M. Tahir.
The resurgence of the visitors that had been watched out by the Laskar Sapeh Kerrap team previously were unable to contain it, as evidenced by the first round of defense until the scoresheet held 0-1. The Jayapura Persipura guest team gave an unexpected game despite playing at Madura's home, Persipura had a solid strength after being re-coached by his old coach Jacksen F Tiago.
The journey of the match in the first round took place quite exciting, pressure after pressure from both teams in each other launched, but the team managed despite a number of golden opportunities have not been able to break into the visitors' goal. Just to note, Jayapura Persipura currently ranks fourth in league standings 1 2019 with 40 points, while Madura United is in second place with 44 points.
